tool_description: Reliable and efficient tool that allows you to validate and extract valuable information from phone numbers. With this API, you can verify if a phone number is valid, determine its type (e.g., mobile, landline), retrieve the country information, and format the phone number according to the specified region.
name: Phone Number Validator
title: Phone Number Validator

api_list.name: Format Number For Region
api_list.description: Formats a given phone number for a specified region

required_parameters.name: country
required_parameters.description: Provide a two letter country code

api_list.name: Validate For Region
api_list.description: Validates phone number for a specified region

required_parameters.name: country
required_parameters.description: Provide a two letter country code
